verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [V: continued] [ARG1: to spread the conspiratorial — and completely unproven — claim that a “ spy ” was “ placed ” inside his presidential campaign by the Obama administration and its Department of Justice] .
